body.name: Retro Game Console Super Console x2 Pro Built-in 100000+ Games, 4K TV/AV Output Emulator Console, Video Game Console Support 60+ Emulators S905X2, EmuELEC 4.5/Android 9.0/CoreE 3 System in One(256G)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 22 mins
features: 🎮【Rich Classic Games】 Super console x2 Pro pre-installed 100000+ games and support 60+ emulators. It runs smoothly in open Linux source system, support download &add more games by users(😀Contact us for a list of games)

🎮【3 systerm in 1】 Retro game console equipped with the latest EmuELEC4.5 game system + Android 9.0 TV system + CoreELEC audio and video system, can be switch the system smoothly. New audio-visual experience, smoother and more realistic

🎮【Upgraded S905X2 Chip】 Emulator console equipped with upgraded S905X2 chip, Amlogic Quard Core ARM Cortex_A53 CPU, 4-core processor, main frequency 1.8GHz. Powerful GPU: Mail-G31 MP2, 2G DDR4 memory runs faster, give you a better gaming experience

🎮【Ultra HD 4K output】 The retro video game console supports 4K@60fps HD output, EmE supports 1080p HD output, it can be connected to display screens, projectors, tvs and other equipment, enjoy the big and clearer screen
🎮【After-Sale Service】We are the manufacturer for this game console, every game system was tested before shippment, if you have any questions, please feel free contact us
🎮【Best Gifts】Super console x2 Pro is a best holiday gifts for families/friends/husband/dad/men. Enjoy the fun of retro games together, bring on the smiles with gifts of games

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Retro Game Console x5 Pro 4TB Retro Game Console Cube x3 Retro Game Console Super x3 Plus Retro Game Console x4 Pl 500G Retro Game Hard Drive 2TB Retro Game Hard Drive Emulators 45+ Emulators 70+ Emulators 68+ Emulators 65+ Emulators 90+ Emulators 85+ Emulators Pre-installed Games 16000+ Games 100000+ Games 111400+ Games 65000+ Games 111700+ Games 120000+ Games Systems Game System/Android 12.0 EmuELEC 4.5/Android 9.0/CoreELEC EmuELEC 4.5/Android 9.0/CoreELEC EmuELEC 4.6/Android 11.0/CoreELEC Batocera 33 Game Syetem Batocera 33 Game Syetem

Retro game console x2 pro with built in 100,000+ classic retro games, take you to recall your childhood, release from work stress, and have fun with friends and families Under Android 9.0 system, super console x2 pro compatible with most software, games and APPs, downloading apps from Android Market, you can watch online videos with your family. Ethernet 1000M and Dual-Band Wi-Fi 2.4G/5G, game emulator with faster speed, lower latency, you will have a fast and smooth online experience. Don’t worry about screen freezes and buffering.

Game console x2 pro equipped with the S905X2 chip, the Mail-G31 MP2 GPU, DDR4 memory. It has faster image processing speed and can run large-scale games without stuttering. Emulator console support 4K 60fps HD video output, dynamic video resolution equivalent to 4 times the resolution of ordinary 1080P TV, giving you a visual feast. These rich features make retro video game console X2 Pro a great assistant for our entertainment and work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars so many games!
reviews.reviewText: I have been re-living childhood games and so have all of my friends! been having some serious street fighter and tekken tournaments!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Don’t waste your money. I bought this for my son and it has not worked correctly since we plugged it in. And the controllers are awful, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I dont know why this has poor reviews because mine is awesome. every game ever. the controllers work fine. sometimes the bt loses connection u just gotta unplug and replug or buy some better usb bt controllers. the game system is legit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Emulator, faulty controller.
reviews.reviewText: I was ecstatic to receive this emulator console to finally play the games from yesteryear and on My phone to My TV. Had a friend come thru to play as well, but only one controller worked. HEATED. The ONLY saving grace, is the remote works as a controller on some games.Waiting on the seller to return my email.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Won't let me play games
reviews.reviewText: It goes thru the menu items, until it's time to make a final choice, say picking the vehicle to race, then it just does nothing. Trying to pick a character to fight with. Unresponsive, but I can go back a option, or kill the emulator.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Games do not load. I sent a message to the seller but they never replied. I’m returning the item now as it’s useless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars To the last review
reviews.reviewText: If some of the games work with the PS controller get the 8 bit controller that looks like the Super Nintendo controller . I was having issues using the “PlayStation” controller as well. I’m playing Super Metroid with the 8bit controller and it’s working fine .
